company.name: CV. Elektro Jaya Abadi
company.text1: Starting from a small shop in West Jakarta, CV. Elektro Jaya Abadi has now developed into one of the leading electrical equipment distributors in Indonesia. With more than 25 years of experience, we truly understand customer needs.
company.text2: We provide various electrical equipment from leading brands such as Schneider Electric, Panasonic, Philips, and ABB. All products we sell are original products with official warranties from manufacturers.
company.text3: In addition to selling products, we also provide electrical installation and consultation services. Our experienced and certified technician team is ready to help you complete various electrical projects.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: At OmegaLight, we provide comprehensive electrical solutions designed to meet the diverse needs of modern businesses and residential properties. Our team of certified professionals brings years of experience and cutting-edge technology to every project.
introduction.text2: From basic electrical installations to complex industrial systems, we ensure safety, reliability, and efficiency in all our services. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted partner for electrical solutions.

feature1.title: Safety First
feature1.description: All our installations meet the highest safety standards and comply with local electrical codes.

feature2.title: Professional Service
feature2.description: Our certified electricians provide expert installation and maintenance services.

feature3.title: 24/7 Support
feature3.description: Round-the-clock emergency support for critical electrical issues.

feature4.title: Competitive Pricing
feature4.description: Fair and transparent pricing with no hidden costs or surprises.

detailed.title: Detailed Information
detailed.text1: Our electrical services encompass a wide range of solutions, from residential wiring and lighting installations to complex commercial and industrial electrical systems. We use only high-quality materials and the latest technology to ensure long-lasting, reliable results.
detailed.text2: We pride ourselves on delivering projects on time and within budget, while maintaining the highest standards of workmanship. Our team stays updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to provide innovative solutions that meet evolving customer needs.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Contact our team today for a free consultation and quote for your electrical project.

price.note: Prices may change at any time. Contact us for current pricing information.

description.title: About Product
description.text1: Philips LED Light 9W Cool Daylight is a modern lighting solution that combines high energy efficiency with superior light quality. With cutting-edge LED technology from Philips, this light provides bright and even illumination for various household and commercial needs.
description.text2: Designed to replace traditional 60W incandescent bulbs, this LED light saves up to 85% electricity consumption while providing equivalent light output. With a lifespan of up to 15,000 hours, your investment will pay off in the long run.

benefits.title: Product Advantages
benefits.benefit2: High energy efficiency with savings up to 85%
benefits.benefit3: Bright white light ideal for work and study spaces
benefits.benefit6: Official warranty from Philips Indonesia distributor

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.review1: This Philips LED light is excellent! The light is bright and not glaring. Been using it for 6 months and still durable. Highly recommended for those who want to replace home lights.
reviews.review2: Good quality as expected. Fast delivery and safe packaging. Price is also competitive compared to other stores. Will order again for other rooms.
reviews.review3: Original Philips product at affordable price. Home electricity became more efficient after replacing all lights with LED. Thank you OmegaLight!

article.title: Essential Guide to Modern Electrical Installation: Safety Tips and Best Practices
article.excerpt: Learn the fundamental principles of safe electrical installation, from planning to execution. This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know about modern electrical systems and safety protocols.
article.imageCaption: Modern electrical installation with safety equipment and professional tools
article.introParagraph1: Electrical installation is a critical aspect of any construction or renovation project. Whether you're building a new home, upgrading an existing electrical system, or simply adding new outlets, understanding the fundamentals of electrical work is essential for safety and compliance.
article.introParagraph2: In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the key principles of modern electrical installation, covering everything from initial planning and design to final testing and certification. Our goal is to provide you with the knowledge needed to make informed decisions about your electrical projects.
article.assessmentParagraph: Before beginning any electrical work, it's crucial to conduct a thorough assessment of your current electrical system and future needs. This includes evaluating the existing wiring, determining power requirements, and identifying potential safety hazards.
article.checklist4: Check local building codes and permits
article.warningText: Electrical work can be dangerous and should only be performed by qualified professionals. Always turn off power at the main breaker before beginning any electrical work and use proper safety equipment.
article.safetyParagraph: Safety should always be your top priority when working with electrical systems. Here are the essential safety measures that every electrical installation project should follow.
article.toolsCardText: Wire strippers, screwdrivers, pliers, voltage tester, and multimeter are essential for most electrical work.
article.safetyCardText: Insulated gloves, safety glasses, hard hat, and non-conductive footwear for personal protection.
article.materialsCardText: Use only certified electrical components, proper gauge wiring, and approved junction boxes.
article.conclusionParagraph: Proper electrical installation is crucial for the safety and functionality of any building. While this guide provides valuable insights into the process, remember that electrical work should always be performed by licensed professionals who can ensure compliance with local codes and safety standards.

header.title: Modern Office Building Electrical Installation
header.subtitle: Complete electrical system installation for a 15-story modern office building including smart lighting, power distribution, and emergency systems with energy-efficient solutions.

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.text1: This comprehensive electrical installation project involved designing and implementing a complete electrical infrastructure for a modern 15-story office building in Jakarta's central business district. The project required careful planning, coordination with multiple stakeholders, and adherence to the highest safety and quality standards.
overview.text2: Our team successfully delivered a state-of-the-art electrical system that includes smart lighting controls, energy-efficient power distribution, emergency backup systems, and integrated building management capabilities. The project was completed on time and within budget, exceeding client expectations.

phase1.title: Phase 1: Planning & Design
phase1.description: Initial site survey, electrical load calculations, system design, and permit applications.

phase2.title: Phase 2: Infrastructure Installation
phase2.description: Main electrical panels, conduit systems, cable trays, and primary power distribution.

phase3.title: Phase 3: Systems Integration
phase3.description: Lighting controls, building automation, fire safety systems, and smart building features.

phase4.title: Phase 4: Testing & Commissioning
phase4.description: System testing, performance verification, staff training, and final documentation.

testimonial.text: OmegaLight exceeded our expectations in every aspect of this project. Their technical expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to quality resulted in a world-class electrical system that will serve our building for decades to come. The project was completed on time and within budget.
testimonial.name: Michael Chen

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Answers to Commonly Asked Questions
faqs.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our products, services, and store policies.

q1.question: Are all products sold original?
q1.preview: Yes, all products we sell are original products with official warranty from manufacturers...

answer.p1: Yes, all products we sell are original products with official warranty from manufacturers. We partner directly with official distributors of leading brands such as Schneider Electric, Panasonic, Philips, ABB, and others.
answer.p2: Every product comes with authenticity certificate and official warranty that can be claimed at official service centers throughout Indonesia. We also provide additional warranty for customer satisfaction.

details.1: All products have hologram and serial numbers that can be verified
details.2: We provide authenticity certificate for bulk purchases
details.3: Our team can help verify product authenticity before purchase

q2.question: How to know the right product specifications?
q2.preview: Our technician team is ready to provide free consultation to help you choose the right product...

answer.p1: Our technician team is ready to provide free consultation to help you choose the right product. You can contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or come directly to the store for consultation.

q3.question: Do you provide electrical installation services?
q3.preview: Yes, we provide electrical installation services with experienced and certified technicians...

answer.p1: Yes, we provide electrical installation services with experienced and certified technicians. Installation services include residential, building, factory, and various other electrical projects.

q4.question: How long does the electrical installation process take?
q4.preview: The working time depends on the complexity of the project. For residential it usually takes 1-3 days...

answer.p1: The working time depends on the complexity of the project. For residential it usually takes 1-3 days, while large projects can take several weeks. Our team will provide accurate time estimates after the survey.

q5.question: Is there delivery service to other cities?
q5.preview: Yes, we serve deliveries throughout Indonesia through trusted expeditions...

answer.p1: Yes, we serve deliveries throughout Indonesia through trusted expeditions such as JNE, J&T, and TIKI. For Jakarta and surrounding areas, we also provide delivery services with our own fleet.

q6.question: What are the shipping costs for large purchases?
q6.preview: For large purchases, we provide special discounts including free shipping...

answer.p1: For large purchases, we provide special discounts including free shipping for Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang, and Bekasi areas. Please contact our sales team for the best offer.

q7.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q7.preview: We accept various payment methods: cash, bank transfer, e-wallet, and credit cards...

answer.p1: We accept various payment methods: cash, bank transfer (BCA, Mandiri, BNI, BRI), e-wallet (OVO, GoPay, Dana), and credit cards. For large purchases, credit system is also available with certain conditions.

q8.question: Is it possible to buy on credit or installments?
q8.preview: Yes, we provide credit payment system for regular customers and large projects...

answer.p1: Yes, we provide credit payment system for regular customers and large projects. We also work with several leasing companies for installment convenience. Contact our sales team for more information.

q9.question: What is the product warranty policy?
q9.preview: Each product has warranty according to manufacturer policy, ranging from 6 months to 5 years...

answer.p1: Each product has warranty according to manufacturer policy, ranging from 6 months to 5 years. Warranty covers manufacturing defects and we will help the warranty claim process to official service centers.

q10.question: How to claim warranty if the product has problems?
q10.preview: Contact us by bringing the purchase receipt and the problematic product...

answer.p1: Contact us by bringing the purchase receipt and the problematic product. Our team will help with initial checking and direct you to the official service center if needed. The claim process usually takes 7-14 working days.
